attributes.action: urge the United Nations to threaten the US with sanctions unless they sign up to the agreement to reduce greenhouse gases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Once again the US are refusing to sign any agreement that intends to reduce greenhouse gases. This arrogant stance is harming the planet for ourselves and our children. It is time for the world to act against the US and similar nations who refuse to sign these agreements
